692000.sentence: There is a loop hole in the trade assurance and the merchants are taking advantage on it . when an order is placed and payment made , the merchant will specify that they had shipped out the parcel with a dummy tracking number . This will tricked the system that the seller had shipped out but in fact they have not . Since that the buyer assumes that the seller had shipped , buyer will not question anything until when the trade assurance had expired and the parcel has not been shipped out . This is when the buyer realized that the seller had been tricked by the buyer . The buyer will be at the mercy of the seller as there are no Alibaba assurance anymore . I strongly suggest that Alibaba look into this practice by some merchants seriously
